name: Arnel Cayabyab
text: Another concern that my wife and I often discuss is this. Let's assume that he would be successful in controlling crime by giving more power to the police and letting them have their way. Let's assume also that he would also somehow still control the police. What would happen if his term ends? What would happen if he dies? Would the police suddenly change back to how they were before a du30 presidency? Malamang hindi. Macoconsume din sila ng power na mafifeel nila. Chaos na kasunod.
